scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev:server: npm run build:server && concurrently "tsc -p server/tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon -r source-map-support/register dist-server/api/index.js"
scripts.start:server: npm run build:server && node -r source-map-support/register dist-server/api/index.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:client: npx eslint client/ --ext .ts && npx prettier client/ --check
scripts.lint:server: npx eslint server/ --ext .ts && npx prettier server/ --check
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:server
scripts.format:client: npx eslint client/ --ext .ts --fix && npx prettier client/ --write
scripts.format:server: npx eslint server/ --ext .ts --fix && npx prettier server/ --write
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -r source-map-support/register dist-server/test
